Title: A Sliver of Silver
Description:
Tyr's final memories are in our hands. This is not a responsibility to be taken lightly.

Let us take the Silver Scale to Nozdormu in Tyrhold. We will attempt to use the console there to awaken him. 

If he is whole again, there will be much to discuss.
ObjectivesText: Escape the tomb and return to the Aspects at Tyrhold in Valdrakken.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Speak to Nozdormu at Tyrhold in Valdrakken.

Objectives.Text: Use the Titan Transporter to return to Tyrhold.
